WorkItem.Description: Tool Tip for Scale of Fates no longer lists "use function", as a result the dps calculation and optimization significantly reduce the rating on the item.
WorkItem.Summary: Scale of Fates no longer includes "use" function for haste resulting in significant drop in dps calculations.

Comments.Message: Yeah, the Armory parsing for it broke; refresh it from Wowhead.

Since at least build 35285, even refreshing from wowhead doesn't work anymore. Nor does manually editing the item. Rawr.mage is showing the activations in the spell cycles tooltip, but not actually calculating the on-use proc to have any value.
The armory parsing for this broke again in 2.2.14, but refreshing from Wowhead does work.
